metadata.title: CVE-2017-17566 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing PV guest OS users tocause a denial of service (host OS crash) or gain host OS privileges inshadow mode by mapping a certain auxiliary page.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
